text: Oscar Johnson (died March 2019Pioneer, Legend and Hall of Famer Oscar Johnson Has Passed, blacktennishalloffame.com (access: July 16, 2019).) was an American tennis player who was the first black person to win a United States Lawn Tennis Association (USLTA) tournament – the Long Beach Junior Open on July 4, 1948, age 17Paul Fein, Tennis Confidential, Washington 2002, p. 254.. He was awarded by the International Tennis Hall of Fame in 1987 and inducted to the Black Tennis Hall of Fame in 20102010 Hall of Fame Inductees, blacktennishalloffame.com (access: July 16, 2019).. ==References== Category:African-American male tennis players Category:American male tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:Year of birth missing Category:2019 deaths Category:Tennis people from California
title: Oscar Johnson (tennis)
